post.body: And BTW Carrie and Brittney have one of those mom and daughter sexy photos circa 1992 you should submit it, I'm still laughing!
Oh Dear God that sexy people blog is one of the funniest sites I've ever seen! I was just crying from laughing so hard
Merry Christmas to you Lady, Hope y'all enjoy your white Christmas, Mitch & I are off to purchase beer & wine 4 2nite & tomorrow
Plus our other pals we've met hanging out there so much & becoming regulars, u can't beat the food, pints and good service
the Chef they have is incredible they are running a special dinner w/ Champagne included, Mitch's mom is coming w/ us too
oh how very nice, heard there was snow there! We are actually going to an evening out to our fav pub Culhanes, full 3 course meal
May the new year treat you and your business well! What plans do you have for new years eve?? Hotel events??
Big Merry Xmas to u & Johnny and the boys-hope you have a great day! Sorry you're missin your daddy 2-day big hugs sista!
Feliz Navidad Amigo! Enjoy your time together!
what was his name on Barney Miller?? I have "fish" stuck in my head but can't remember??
your mail lady won't leave her truck for fear of being shot at in Oakland by people just randomly shooting!
Ok Johnnys comments over the video are even more funny! He's not an proud and involved dad or anything?? LOL funny stuff!
For reals abe vigoda is still alive?? Who knew??
Happy Holidays to you 2 Fonz! Hope you enjoy your special time with your boy as well as your girls! Can't wait to see you in 2009!
And BTW Carrie and Brittney have one of those mom and daughter photos circa 1992 you should submit it, I'm still laughing! LOL
Happy Monday Hope everyone enjoyed their holiday-we sure did! Now onto thoughts of New Year resolutions..hmmmm
Gotta finish wrapping gifts and get started on the enchiladas, grandmas spanish rice and chili beans -Making myself hungry thinkin bout it
Just got bk from some morning Xmas Eve yoga and had tea and cookies with everyone afterwords, very nice way to start off the holiday Namaste
Mitch's uncle died a week ago Saturday and just found out today as well. He battled w/ cancer for years so RIP Uncle Jesse
OMG Mitch's dad was in the hospital for the last 8 days and we just found out today now that he's home!
